title: Stinna Kaastrup:Stinna Kaastrup Has No Legs Since Birth, But She Is A World Class Equestrian With A Paralympic Medal To Her Name
text:
Stinna Kaastrup Has No Legs Since Birth, But She Is A World Class Equestrian With A Paralympic Medal To Her Name

Stinna Kaastrup Has No Legs Since Birth, But She Is A World Class Equestrian With A Paralympic Medal To Her Name

In sports there are several stories which just take your breath away and some of them really stand out. When it comes to the tale of Stinna Kaastrup from Denmark, well, she is something special. After all, the hard work she's put in is something else entirely.

Stinna was born without legs but that did not stop her from becoming a world class equestrian. She won the bronze medal at the 2016 Paralympics in the Individual Championship test grade Ib event.

hopesthehuddle

Stinna started riding when she was still a kid and gradually she excelled at it. After a point she did not even need help in maintaining balance despite not having lower limbs to support her.

In 2018 she won gold at the FEI World Equestrian Games. She would have competed in the 2012 edition of the Paralympics too but her horse passed away.

Don't Miss 1.5 K SHARES 410 SHARES

hopesthehuddle

Nonetheless she has already proved that no handicap can stop one's resolve. Her story is one of inspiration for future para-athletes especially those going or horse related sports. One wishes her all the success in the future. May she see more success in the years to come.
